QuestData.Title: A Foot in the Door
QuestData.Description: <Lord Taran immediately pins you down with his steely gaze.>$B$B$C, you bear the marks of many a past battle.$B$BGood! We need more seasoned people like you to hold back the front.$B$BWe've managed to secure a foothold here, but the yaungol are desperate to remove our presence.$B$BIf you wish to prove your worth, go down the hill and show the yaungol that we will not back down.
QuestData.RewardText: Good. I can see that you are capable.$B$BI hope to rely on your talents for what is to come.
